official_title: A bill to provide that salary adjustments for Members of Congress shall be payable only when the total receipts of the U.S. Government exceed the total outlays during the fiscal year.
short_title: Federal Debt Reduction Incentive-Profit Sharing-Pay Raise Commission Reform Act

summary.text: Federal Debt Reduction Incentive-Profit Sharing-Pay Raise Commission Reform Act - Sets annual salaries of Members of Congress at $42,500 plus a commission of $1,000 per year for each $1,000,000,000 of Federal annual budget surplus applied to retirement of the national debt during the fiscal year next preceding up to a maximum of $48,825 per year. Sets the annual salaries of the Speaker of the House and the congressional floor leaders at a maximum of $70,000 and $60,000 respectively.
